name: cryptid!
description:
Cryptid! is a walkthrough personality quiz to find your inner mythical creature. It was made in Bitsy.

There are 4 possible endings - which will you get?

This was created during my time as a student mentor for the DePaul  CDM & CHA Youth Game & Graphic Design program July 2021.

Find more of my work at carolineschlegel.com
